BehaveUpdate.description:
NEXTBOT [Server] 

[number] interval
  How long since the last update

OnContact.description:
NEXTBOT [Server] 

[Entity] ent
  The entity the nextbot came in contact with.

OnKilled.description:
NEXTBOT [Server] Called when the bot gets killed.

[CTakeDamageInfo] info
  The damage info

OnLandOnGround.description:
NEXTBOT [Server] 

[Entity] ent
  The entity the nextbot has landed on.

OnLeaveGround.description:
NEXTBOT [Server] 

[Entity] ent
  The entity the bot "jumped" from.

OnNavAreaChanged.description:
NEXTBOT [Server] 

[CNavArea] old
  The navigation area the bot just left

[CNavArea] new
  The navigation area the bot just entered

OnOtherKilled.description:
NEXTBOT [Server] 

[Entity] victim
  The victim that was killed

[CTakeDamageInfo] info
  The damage info

Use.description:
NEXTBOT [Server] Called when a player 'uses' the entity.

[Entity] activator
  The initial cause for the use.

[Entity] caller
  The entity that directly triggered the use.

[number] type
  The type of use, see USE_ Enums

[number] value
  Any passed value
